BackstoryDef.title: Angry patty flipper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a burger flipper at a fast food restaurant. [PAWN_pronoun] faced abuse from the supervisor until one day when [PAWN_nameDef] snapped and shoved their head in the deep fryer.

BackstoryDef.title: Exiled scholar
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Once a respected scholar at a prestigious university, [PAWN_nameDef] was exiled after uncovering corruption at the highest levels. Without resources but rich in knowledge, [PAWN_pronoun] ventured into the rim to seek a new beginning, hoping to leave the past behind and maybe, one day, reclaim [PAWN_possessive] honor.

BackstoryDef.title: Retired pirate king
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ruled the space lanes with an iron fist, amassing wealth and enemies in equal measure. After a mutiny ousted [PAWN_possessive] from power, [PAWN_pronoun] escaped to the rimworlds, hiding [PAWN_possessive] true identity. Now living a quieter life, [PAWN_pronoun] still knows how to handle a gun and negotiate a tough deal.

BackstoryDef.title: Galactic explorer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of an elite team of explorers charting unknown territories of space. Stranded on a rimworld after a catastrophic ship failure, [PAWN_pronoun] must now use [PAWN_possessive] survival skills and scientific knowledge to adapt to this harsh new environment.

BackstoryDef.title: Disgraced politician
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Once a rising star in [PAWN_possessive] home planet's political scene, [PAWN_nameDef]'s career was ruined by a scandalâ€”falsely accused, yet unable to prove [PAWN_possessive] innocence. Exiled to a remote rimworld, [PAWN_pronoun] now seeks to rebuild [PAWN_possessive] life, leveraging [PAWN_possessive] charisma and understanding of power dynamics.

BackstoryDef.title: Top chef
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A chef renowned across several systems for [PAWN_possessive] culinary mastery, [PAWN_nameDef] left [PAWN_possessive] galaxy-trotting lifestyle after a near-fatal food poisoning incident at [PAWN_possessive] own restaurant. Now, [PAWN_pronoun] cooks only for [PAWN_possessive] fellow survivors, hoping to find redemption one meal at a time.

BackstoryDef.title: Fast food manager
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] managed a bustling fast food restaurant. [PAWN_pronoun] dealt with everything from scheduling shifts to resolving customer complaints. Although the job was stressful, it taught [PAWN_possessive] how to handle people and crunch numbers effectively.

BackstoryDef.title: Drive-thru operator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked the drive-thru at a popular fast food joint. [PAWN_pronoun] was known for [PAWN_possessive] quick service and ability to upsell extra fries and desserts. [PAWN_pronoun] often dreamed of leaving the window for something bigger.

BackstoryDef.title: Burger flipper turned chef
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] started flipping burgers at a fast food chain, dreaming of gourmet kitchens. Through hard work and culinary courses, [PAWN_pronoun] eventually became a chef, crafting dishes far beyond fast food origins.

BackstoryDef.title: Disgruntled cashier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a cashier in a fast food restaurant, enduring long hours with little pay. The experience left [PAWN_possessive] with a deep-seated resentment for management and an uncanny ability to handle stress.

BackstoryDef.title: Last minute lottery winner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] won the grand lottery jackpot just hours before being mistakenly abducted by a passing spaceship. Stranded on a foreign planet with nothing but memories of riches, [PAWN_pronoun] dreams of what could have been while learning to adapt to [PAWN_possessive] new reality.

BackstoryDef.title: Game show escapee
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a contestant on a dangerous interstellar game show where survival was the prize. [PAWN_pronoun] managed to escape the studio against all odds, using cunning and quick thinking, skills that [PAWN_pronoun] still finds useful.

BackstoryDef.title: Zoo break survivor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: During a visit to an exotic zoo, [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_possessive]self amidst a sudden animal breakout. Using [PAWN_possessive] knowledge of animal behavior and quick reflexes, [PAWN_pronoun] survived the chaos and even helped recapture the escapees.

BackstoryDef.title: Apocalyptic party survivor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was attending what was supposed to be a typical end-of-the-world themed party, but things took a surreal turn when actual meteors began falling. Surviving the disaster, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to never underestimate the importance of a good shelter and a stocked pantry.

BackstoryDef.title: Space viking raider
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a clan of space-faring Vikings, known for their fearsome raids on interstellar trade routes. Growing up in this harsh, warrior culture, [PAWN_pronoun] learned the arts of combat and ship navigation, always respecting the old gods and the code of honor.

BackstoryDef.title: Mead brewer technician
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a massive meadery on a colony steeped in Nordic traditions, using advanced biotechnology to craft beverages fit for the gods. The skills [PAWN_pronoun] developed not only include brewing but also a deep understanding of bioengineering and chemistry.

BackstoryDef.title: Rune cyberneticist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a master of blending ancient runic lore with modern technology. [PAWN_pronoun] specialized in engraving mystical runes onto cybernetic implants to enhance their power and utility, making [PAWN_possessive] a sought-after artisan across the stars.

BackstoryDef.title: Galactic skald
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled between star systems, reciting epic sagas of old and new heroes. Equipped with a digital lute and a vast archive of stories, [PAWN_pronoun] keeps the culture alive, inspiring warriors and common folk alike with tales of valor and adventure.

BackstoryDef.title: Cursed archeologist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a renowned archeologist who unearthed an ancient artifact believed to be cursed. Since then, bizarre occurrences and unexplainable accidents plagued [PAWN_possessive]. Now, far from civilization, [PAWN_pronoun] hopes to escape the curseâ€™s reach.

BackstoryDef.title: Escaped experiment
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the subject of horrific genetic experiments that aimed to create the perfect soldier. Having escaped the secret facility, [PAWN_pronoun] now seeks refuge in the remote corners of the galaxy, constantly haunted by [PAWN_possessive] past and the monstrous abilities [PAWN_pronoun] gained.

BackstoryDef.title: Ghost town sheriff
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the sheriff of a small town that slowly became haunted by unexplained phenomena. As the town's population dwindled, [PAWN_pronoun] remained, determined to protect any souls brave enough to stay or too unfortunate to leave.

BackstoryDef.title: Survivor of the undead
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived through a nightmarish outbreak that turned loved ones into the undead. [PAWN_pronoun] managed to survive through sheer will and a knack for barricading. Now on the rim, [PAWN_pronoun] prepares for any threat with obsessive diligence.

BackstoryDef.title: Retired star athlete
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a celebrated star in a galaxy-wide sports league, known for [PAWN_possessive] incredible agility and strength. After suffering a career-ending injury, [PAWN_pronoun] retired to a quiet life on the rim, though the thrill of competition never truly left [PAWN_possessive].

BackstoryDef.title: Competitive gamer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] dominated the competitive gaming scene, winning multiple championships in virtual reality sports. The skills [PAWN_pronoun] honed in digital arenas translate surprisingly well to real-world tactics and survival strategies.

BackstoryDef.title: Olympic medic
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a medic at the interstellar Olympics, specializing in sports injuries and rehabilitation. This experience gave [PAWN_pronoun] unparalleled medical skills and an understanding of the physical limits of various species.

BackstoryDef.title: Professional couch potato
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] adult life on a couch, watching old shows and playing video games. Lacking any real skills and having almost no motivation, [PAWN_pronoun] is unprepared for the challenges of the rimworld.

BackstoryDef.title: Failed inventor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s inventions never worked as intendedâ€”often with catastrophic results. Not only has this shattered [PAWN_possessive] confidence, but it also led to a fear of anything mechanical or electrical.

BackstoryDef.title: Paranoid recluse
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent years isolated from society, consumed by conspiracy theories and preparing for end-of-world scenarios that never happened. Largely inept at social interactions and terrified of leaving enclosed spaces, [PAWN_pronoun] struggles with the demands of colony life.

BackstoryDef.title: Clumsy magician
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a stage magician who never quite mastered the art of illusion. Although [PAWN_pronoun] often botched tricksâ€”sometimes spectacularlyâ€”[PAWN_pronoun] learned a lot about entertaining and distracting people, even if it wasn't always intentional.

BackstoryDef.title: Overenthusiastic critic
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] made a career out of critiquing everything from gourmet meals to space opera plays. Unfortunately, [PAWN_pronoun] was so enthusiastic that [PAWN_pronoun] often failed to develop any practical skills related to the arts [PAWN_pronoun] reviewed.

BackstoryDef.title: Ex-pro wrestler chef
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef], once a professional wrestler, decided to hang up the tights and pursue a passion for cooking. While [PAWN_pronoun] excels in kitchen brawls and can handle heavy pots like no other, [PAWN_possessive] delicate touch leaves much to be desired.

BackstoryDef.title: Accidental inventor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] stumbled upon several significant inventions entirely by accident. While brilliant in sporadic bursts, [PAWN_pronoun] often forgets essential steps and procedures, leading to frequent mishaps and breakdowns.

BackstoryDef.title: Legendary luchador
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a legendary figure in the world of interstellar lucha libre wrestling. Known for [PAWN_possessive] charismatic performances and spectacular mask, [PAWN_pronoun] inspired millions. Off the ring, [PAWN_pronoun] uses those same skills to motivate and protect [PAWN_possessive] fellow colonists.

BackstoryDef.title: Wrestling promoter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a shrewd wrestling promoter, responsible for some of the biggest matches in the galaxy. While [PAWN_pronoun] never fought in the ring, [PAWN_pronoun] knows how to spot talent and handle large crowds, making [PAWN_possessive] an excellent recruiter and negotiator.

BackstoryDef.title: Ring technician
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked behind the scenes as a technician setting up wrestling rings for major events. While not a wrestler [PAWN_pronoun]self, [PAWN_pronoun] learned a great deal about maintaining equipment and building sturdy structures under pressure.

BackstoryDef.title: Fallen wrestling star
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a top star in the wrestling world, loved by fans across the galaxy. However, after a scandal and a series of poor decisions, [PAWN_pronoun] fell from grace. Now on the rim, [PAWN_pronoun] seeks redemption and a fresh start, still using those old wrestling moves for defense.

BackstoryDef.title: Elite sniper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an elite sniper in a planetary defense force, specializing in long-range combat and reconnaissance. [PAWN_pronoun] spent years honing [PAWN_possessive] skills, able to eliminate threats before they even knew they were in danger.

BackstoryDef.title: Guerrilla fighter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a war-torn region, joining a guerrilla group at a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to fight with limited resources and mastered the art of ambush and sabotage to survive against better-equipped foes.

BackstoryDef.title: Combat mechanic
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a combat mechanic in an interstellar corps, responsible for constructing and demolishing fortifications in active warzones. [PAWN_pronoun] excels at building under pressure and dismantling enemy structures.

BackstoryDef.title: Mercenary leader
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the feared leader of a notorious mercenary group, known for taking high-stakes contracts. [PAWN_pronoun] not only fought on the front lines but also strategized all operations, earning a reputation as a master tactician and ruthless adversary.

BackstoryDef.title: Space mushroom farmer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in cultivating exotic mushrooms in zero-gravity environments. These mushrooms had unique properties, from glowing in the dark to providing medicinal benefits. [PAWN_pronoun] developed a knack for botany and a passion for fungi during these years.

BackstoryDef.title: Insectoid silk breeder
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] managed a farm where exotic insectoids were bred for their silk, used in making ultra-strong fabrics. The job required a deep understanding of genetics and a steady hand, as the insectoids were as dangerous as they were valuable.

BackstoryDef.title: Energy flower cultivator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew a rare type of plant known as Energy Flowers, which were capable of absorbing and storing solar energy. These plants were not only a sustainable power source but also highly explosive if not handled correctly.

BackstoryDef.title: Crystal harvester
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on a remote farm that specialized in growing and harvesting energy crystals. These crystals were not only beautiful but also a key component in advanced electronics and power systems. Handling them required precision and care due to their volatile nature.

BackstoryDef.title: Disgraced knight
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a knight in service to a great kingdom, renowned for [PAWN_possessive] bravery and skill in battle. However, after being falsely accused of treason, [PAWN_pronoun] was stripped of [PAWN_possessive] title and lands. Exiled, [PAWN_pronoun] now seeks to restore [PAWN_possessive] honor on a distant rimworld.

BackstoryDef.title: Banished prince
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef], the second-born prince of a powerful kingdom, was banished after a scandalous affair that threatened the royal family's reputation. Skilled in diplomacy but lacking survival skills, [PAWN_pronoun] struggles to adapt to life beyond the palace walls.

BackstoryDef.title: Forgotten queen
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] once ruled a small but prosperous kingdom, beloved by her subjects. Overthrown by a jealous rival, she now lives in hiding, her regal skills largely irrelevant to the gritty reality of rimworld survival, yet she still carries herself with undeniable grace and authority.

BackstoryDef.title: Master royal falconer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as the master falconer at a medieval court, training birds of prey for hunting and sport. While [PAWN_pronoun] possesses unmatched skills with animals, [PAWN_pronoun] often finds it challenging to deal with people, preferring the company of [PAWN_possessive] feathered friends.

BackstoryDef.title: Treasure hunter navigator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a navigator for a notorious band of space pirates, always on the hunt for legendary treasures scattered across the universe. [PAWN_pronoun] possesses an unparalleled sense of direction and a deep understanding of astro-cartography, always dreaming of finding that one great score.

BackstoryDef.title: Ex-pirate doctor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a doctor aboard a pirate ship, learning to treat wounds and illnesses with limited resources while at sea. Despite [PAWN_possessive] rough exterior and unorthodox methods, [PAWN_pronoun] has saved many lives with [PAWN_possessive] makeshift surgeries and herbal remedies.

BackstoryDef.title: Fugitive sea cook
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the cook on a pirate ship, infamous across the galaxy not just for [PAWN_possessive] culinary skills but also for [PAWN_possessive] past as a fugitive from justice. [PAWN_pronoun] dreams of opening [PAWN_possessive] own restaurant someday, if [PAWN_pronoun] can ever escape [PAWN_possessive] checkered past.

BackstoryDef.title: Cursed shipwright
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a gifted shipwright known for crafting vessels that could sail through the most treacherous of cosmic storms. However, after building a ship that was cursed by an ancient archotech specter, [PAWN_pronoun] now seeks to break the curse that has doomed all of [PAWN_possessive] creations.

BackstoryDef.title: Frontier lawman
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a marshal on a remote frontier planet, where [PAWN_pronoun] maintained order among miners and settlers. [PAWN_pronoun] became a legend for [PAWN_possessive] ability to settle disputes and hunt down fugitives with a blend of diplomacy and deadly accuracy.

BackstoryDef.title: Saloon owner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] owned and operated the busiest saloon on a bustling trade route. Known for [PAWN_possessive] ability to keep peace among the rough clientele, [PAWN_pronoun] also had a knack for eavesdropping and gathering information from the disparate travelers who passed through.

BackstoryDef.title: Renegade outlaw
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a notorious outlaw in the outer colonies, leading a gang that robbed interstellar trade shipments. [PAWN_pronoun] evaded capture for years, earning a reputation as a ghost in the deserts of distant planets.

BackstoryDef.title: Drifter sharpshooter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] roamed from town to town on the frontier, making a living with [PAWN_possessive] unmatched marksmanship skills. Whether it was participating in shooting contests or helping local farmers fend off bandit raids, [PAWN_pronoun] always had a steady hand and a calm demeanor.

BackstoryDef.title: Unlucky fisherman
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the most unlucky fisherman in his coastal village. Every time [PAWN_pronoun] went out to sea, [PAWN_pronoun] either came back with nothing or with stories of "the one that got away." Despite [PAWN_possessive] lack of success, [PAWN_pronoun] remained inexplicably cheerful and optimistic.

BackstoryDef.title: Clueless apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an apprentice in various trades but never seemed to grasp the basics of any of them. Despite years of training, [PAWN_pronoun] could turn even the simplest task into a disaster. However, [PAWN_pronoun] always managed to make everyone laugh, whether [PAWN_pronoun] meant to or not.

BackstoryDef.title: Beloved jester
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] could always find the humor in any situation, no matter how dire. Working as a court jester, [PAWN_pronoun] was beloved for [PAWN_possessive] ability to lighten the mood and cheer up even the grumpiest of lords. Sometimes, though, [PAWN_possessive]'s jokes went too far.

BackstoryDef.title: Hopeless romantic
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] adult life in pursuit of the perfect love story, often neglecting practical responsibilities. While [PAWN_pronoun] has a heart of gold and a way with words, [PAWN_pronoun] tends to get carried away with grand romantic gestures.

BackstoryDef.title: Insectoid hybrid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of an experimental program on a distant planet that merged human DNA with that of local insectoid species to create hybrids capable of surviving harsh environments. [PAWN_pronoun] has enhanced senses and reflexes but struggles with complex social interactions due to [PAWN_possessive] unusual instincts.

BackstoryDef.title: Exiled prince
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef], once a prince of an advanced civilization, was exiled after a coup. Skilled in both diplomacy and combat, [PAWN_pronoun] seeks to regain [PAWN_possessive] honor and return to [PAWN_possessive] throne, using [PAWN_possessive] unique pheromone control to influence those around [PAWN_possessive].

BackstoryDef.title: Insectoid hive engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into an insectoid hive worshipping group that specialized in constructing elaborate colonies. As an engineer, [PAWN_pronoun] developed an innate understanding of complex structures. [PAWN_pronoun] aims to apply these skills to rebuild a new community on the rimworld.

BackstoryDef.title: Insectoid colony guard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a guard in an insectoid worshipping colony, tasked with protecting the queen and larvae from predators and rival colonies. This role required relentless vigilance and formidable fighting skills, which [PAWN_pronoun] now uses to defend [PAWN_possessive] new home.

BackstoryDef.title: Rogue smuggler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a charming and resourceful smuggler, flying under the radar of galactic authorities while transporting illicit goods across the star systems. With a knack for talking [PAWN_pronoun]self out of tight situations, [PAWN_pronoun] made a fortune but made just as many enemies.

BackstoryDef.title: Fallen knight
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a member of an ancient order of peacekeepers, trained in the ways of a mysterious power. Exiled after succumbing to the darker aspects of [PAWN_possessive] abilities, [PAWN_pronoun] now seeks redemption or further power on the fringes of the galaxy.

BackstoryDef.title: Galactic senator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a senator in a vast galactic federation, embroiled in political intrigue and the struggle for power among the stars. Skilled in debate and diplomacy, [PAWN_pronoun] often finds that words are [PAWN_possessive] best weapons.

BackstoryDef.title: Starship engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the chief engineer aboard a battleship, responsible for keeping ancient and powerful engines running during critical battles. A genius with technology but somewhat socially awkward, [PAWN_pronoun] finds comfort in machines more than people.

BackstoryDef.title: Accidental time traveler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an ordinary office worker until a freak accident involving a microwave and a lightning storm sent [PAWN_possessive] hurtling through time and space. Now stranded in an unfamiliar era, [PAWN_pronoun] tries to make sense of [PAWN_possessive] bizarre new surroundings.

BackstoryDef.title: Misunderstood mime
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a renowned mime artist, celebrated for [PAWN_possessive] ability to entertain without uttering a single word. Unfortunately, [PAWN_pronoun] takes [PAWN_possessive] role a bit too seriously and never speaks, even in life-threatening situations.

BackstoryDef.title: Reluctant cult leader
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] accidentally started a cult when [PAWN_pronoun] joked about starting one at a party. Surprisingly, the group quickly grew, and [PAWN_pronoun] found [PAWN_possessive]self as the leader of a new religious movement. [PAWN_pronoun] now uses [PAWN_possessive] influence for good... mostly.

BackstoryDef.title: Overzealous safety inspector
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] took [PAWN_possessive] job as a safety inspector too seriously, often halting entire production lines for minor infractions. After shutting down the wrong factory, [PAWN_pronoun] was exiled to the rimworld for being a little too good at [PAWN_possessive] job.

BackstoryDef.title: Former reality show star
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a star on a popular reality show, known for [PAWN_possessive] dramatic antics and ability to stir up controversy for ratings. Now far from the cameras, [PAWN_pronoun] struggles to adapt to real challenges without a script.

BackstoryDef.title: Professional sleeper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] made a living as a professional sleeper, participating in sleep studies for various research labs. Known for [PAWN_possessive] ability to sleep through anything, [PAWN_pronoun] now finds waking life on the rimworld surprisingly exhausting.

BackstoryDef.title: Undercover clown
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked undercover as a clown in an interstellar circus, actually a spy gathering intel on criminal syndicates. While excellent at disguise and deception, [PAWN_pronoun] now struggles to be taken seriously in any serious task.

BackstoryDef.title: Apocalyptic prepper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent years preparing for the end of the world, hoarding supplies and building bunkers. When the apocalypse didn't arrive, [PAWN_pronoun] was left with an abundance of skills and goods but no actual disaster to use them onâ€”until now.

BackstoryDef.title: Raider turned colonist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a member of a fearsome pirate gang, raiding outlying settlements for resources. During one such raid, [PAWN_pronoun] was captured and, instead of being executed, was given a chance to start over by the very people [PAWN_pronoun] once attacked. Grateful and seeking redemption, [PAWN_pronoun] now defends the colony with everything [PAWN_pronoun] has.

BackstoryDef.title: Toxic fallout survivor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived through a catastrophic toxic fallout event on [PAWN_possessive] home world, which wiped out much of the life there. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to survive in harsh, contaminated environments and became adept at chemical synthesis and environmental protection.

BackstoryDef.title: Manhunter pack survivor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the sole survivor of a vicious manhunter pack attack that decimated [PAWN_possessive] village. Armed with only rudimentary weapons, [PAWN_pronoun] managed to fend off the beasts. This traumatic experience left [PAWN_possessive] with a deep-seated fear of animals but honed [PAWN_possessive] combat skills.

BackstoryDef.title: Psychic ship crash investigator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a team that investigated psychic ship crashes, a rare and dangerous phenomenon. [PAWN_pronoun] developed a resistance to psychic influences and gained unique insights into technologies but at the cost of [PAWN_possessive] own mental health.

BackstoryDef.title: Professional apologizer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] made a living by apologizing for things [PAWN_pronoun] didn't do. Hired by companies to smooth over public relations disasters, [PAWN_pronoun] became an expert in looking sincere under any circumstancesâ€”even when being attacked by rabid squirrels.

BackstoryDef.title: Unlucky weatherman
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the only weatherman on a planet where the weather was perfectly predictable... until [PAWN_pronoun] started forecasting. Now known as the bringer of storms, [PAWN_pronoun]'s predictions became infamous for causing panic when [PAWN_pronoun] predicted sunshine.

BackstoryDef.title: Galactic party planner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was renowned across the galaxy for throwing the wildest parties. Unfortunately, [PAWN_pronoun] was too good at [PAWN_possessive] job, leading to several planetary governments banning [PAWN_pronoun] after parties got out of hand and caused weeks of cleanup.

BackstoryDef.title: Clumsy bomb disposal expert
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s career as a bomb disposal expert was marked by numerous close calls, not due to the complexity of the bombs, but because of [PAWN_possessive]'s innate ability to trip over absolutely nothing while carrying live explosives.

BackstoryDef.title: Retired mime artist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a celebrated mime, capable of entertaining crowds without saying a word. Now retired, [PAWN_pronoun] still refuses to speak, which confuses and sometimes irritates [PAWN_possessive] fellow colonists. [PAWN_pronoun] communicates solely through elaborate gestures and expressions.

BackstoryDef.title: Crop circle maker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a secret society that created elaborate crop circles to confuse and amuse. While many believed them to be the work of aliens, [PAWN_pronoun] knows the truth. [PAWN_pronoun] excels in artistic design but often struggles with the more mundane tasks of farming.

BackstoryDef.title: Procrastinating inventor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a knack for innovation and could have been a leading tech developer. However, [PAWN_pronoun] preferred to spend most of [PAWN_possessive] time daydreaming and tinkering with unnecessary gadgets. [PAWN_possessive] creations are brilliant but impractical.

BackstoryDef.title: Conspiracy theorist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is convinced that everything is part of a larger conspiracy, from the weather to the behavior of squirrels. Despite [PAWN_possessive] often erratic behavior and outlandish theories, [PAWN_pronoun] is surprisingly good at research, as [PAWN_pronoun] is always looking for "the truth."

BackstoryDef.title: Space miner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on an asteroid mining vessel, extracting valuable ores from the toughest of celestial bodies. The dangerous environment honed [PAWN_possessive] skills with machinery and survival instincts, making [PAWN_possessive] tough and resourceful.

BackstoryDef.title: Cave delver
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] led expeditions into deep cave systems searching for geological anomalies and rare minerals. [PAWN_possessive]'s extensive knowledge of geology and spelunking makes [PAWN_pronoun] an invaluable asset when it comes to navigating and exploiting underground environments.

BackstoryDef.title: Lost prospector
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a lone prospector on a remote frontier planet, living off the land while searching for precious gems and ores. Years of isolation have made [PAWN_pronoun] a bit eccentric but exceptionally good at finding resources in the least expected places.

BackstoryDef.title: Quarry foreman
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] managed a large quarry operation, overseeing the extraction of massive amounts of stone and ore. [PAWN_pronoun] knows how to motivate workers, manage heavy machinery, and ensure safety standards are met in hazardous conditions.

BackstoryDef.title: Shadow operative
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was trained by a covert organization to carry out espionage and assassinations across the galaxy. Skilled in the art of stealth and equipped with advanced technology, [PAWN_pronoun] completed missions that shaped the balance of power in the cosmos.

BackstoryDef.title: Galactic shinobi
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a member of an ancient shinobi clan that adapted their centuries-old traditions to the space age. Using a combination of traditional techniques and modern weaponry, [PAWN_pronoun] excelled in infiltration and sabotage against corporate and political targets.

BackstoryDef.title: Void assassin
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a shadowy space station, where [PAWN_pronoun] was trained from a young age to navigate the vacuum of space silently and kill without sound. Known for [PAWN_possessive] ability to appear and disappear like a ghost, [PAWN_pronoun] is a feared figure in the underworld.

BackstoryDef.title: Cyber ninja
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a thief who became a cybernetically enhanced ninja after being caught and experimented on by a secretive tech syndicate. Now, [PAWN_pronoun] uses [PAWN_possessive] augmented abilities for high-stakes heists and complex data theft in the sprawling megacities of distant planets.

BackstoryDef.title: Space scout
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a member of a space scout program, which taught [PAWN_possessive] survival skills and basic engineering while exploring distant planets. These experiences sparked [PAWN_possessive] passion for discovery and adventure.

BackstoryDef.title: Apprentice mechanic
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an apprentice in a repair shop. Obsessed with taking things apart and putting them back together, [PAWN_pronoun] became adept at fixing complex machinery from a young age.

BackstoryDef.title: Orphan thief
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on the streets, surviving by picking pockets and swiping whatever [PAWN_pronoun] could. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to be sneaky and quick, skills that are handy in more ways than one.

BackstoryDef.title: Junior cosmic comedian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_possessive] calling early, telling jokes at the intergalactic school they attended. Though not all [PAWN_possessive] jokes landed, [PAWN_pronoun] learned the art of comedic timing and how to handle a tough crowd...

BackstoryDef.title: Child reality show star
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the star of a reality show called "Toddler Survival Challenge". Every week [PAWN_pronoun] faced new playrooms and toy puzzles, turning [PAWN_possessive] into a surprisingly capable and cunning child.

BackstoryDef.title: Miniature mad scientist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't just good at science fairs; [PAWN_pronoun] dominated them. [PAWN_pronoun] built a volcano that actually erupted molten lava, scaring [PAWN_possessive] teachers and thrilling [PAWN_possessive] classmates.

BackstoryDef.title: Prodigy pet whisperer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a knack for understanding animals better than people. [PAWN_pronoun] convinced the family cat to use the toilet, trained the dog to bring in the mail, and even taught the hamster to do simple arithmetic.

BackstoryDef.title: Unlucky young inventor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] loved to invent things, but [PAWN_possessive] inventions often went spectacularly wrong. [PAWN_pronoun] once built a robot to clean [PAWN_possessive] room, but instead, it painted everything bright pink.

BackstoryDef.title: Space circus acrobat
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a traveling space circus, dazzling crowds across the galaxy with [PAWN_possessive] gravity-defying stunts. While most kids learned algebra, [PAWN_pronoun] mastered the art of zero-gravity somersaults and asteroid hopping.

BackstoryDef.title: Junior galactic historian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was obsessed with old space lore and cultures from a very young age. Instead of playing with other children, [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time at museums or reading ancient star charts and manuscripts.

BackstoryDef.title: Child podcaster
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] started a podcast from [PAWN_possessive] bedroom, covering everything from daily colony life to interviewing the local pets. [PAWN_pronoun] developed a small but dedicated following who appreciated [PAWN_possessive] unusual perspectives and adorable voice.

BackstoryDef.title: Young escape artist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a knack for escaping from any confinement: cribs, high chairs, you name it. [PAWN_pronoun] could wriggle out of the tightest spots, which made [PAWN_possessive] quite the handful for [PAWN_possessive] caretakers.

BackstoryDef.title: Little colony mayor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was elected as the 'mayor' of [PAWN_possessive] school, a position [PAWN_pronoun] took very seriously. Organizing games, resolving disputes, and even attempting to implement a candy tax, [PAWN_pronoun] was a pint-sized politician.

BackstoryDef.title: Raised by ducks
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was mysteriously abandoned as an infant near a serene lake and was adopted by a flock of caring ducks. Growing up in the wild, [PAWN_pronoun] learned the ways of the waterfowl, from foraging to swimming expertly. While [PAWN_pronoun] struggles with human language, [PAWN_pronoun] excels in understanding animal behavior and surviving in the wild.
